name: Billy the Winter Pinocchio Elephant
description:
Oh, Billy!

Updated version of a game made for the Ludum Dare 34 game jam.

Link to the original submission.

Controls:

  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to grapple
  • Right click to contract

Music by Kevin MacLeod

If you're using a web browser that doesn't support Unity player (such as Chrome), try the WebGL version here.
